messages.message: @Lee Are you able to setup the Converse APIs using Postman?
Hey, I should have some more time today to take a look. Will report back later.
Thanks @Vasu for the video. Will check this.

I watched your video and I have everything setup correctly. You can see whats happening in the video here. I’ve captured the following 2 issues.
• If you try to create a conversation with a name of a conversation you’ve used previously (even if you’ve deleted it) the creation fails. 
• If you upload a file via the create conversation API, it fails to OCR, but if you upload the same file via the UI, it works fine. 
https://www.loom.com/share/f3b0ea9a5b5944748fa724b9ca7cbd7b?sid=9fea91b6-9eaa-49b9-99ff-32b57f5e60a7

Thanks Vasu, that does seem to have solved the problem. I was thrown by getting a success from the create conversation API but then seeing a failed OCR error in the UI for the conversation I just created. If I ignore the UI, the APIs work as expected. If we plan to make the API available before unifying API and UI behaviour, we’ll need to make it very clear what is happening to prevent the same confusion
